front.title: RFC 3978 Update Regarding Additional Copyright Notices

abstract.t: RFC 3978 disallow additional copyright notices in IETF Documents, butthe running code within the IETF appear to be to ignore that rule andpublish documents with additional copyright notices. There arearguments for permitting additional copyright notices in IETFdocuments, and some are given in this document. This document updatethe paragraph in RFC 3978 that discusses additional copyrights, torelax the requirement.
